ON/OFF Reset Nu Skool Audio Brand with playful. Enjoy customizing for music Keep your device up to date. Layfic Tone is a new audio brand brought to you by USE Inc Customize to your preference with sound quality tailored to your environment. Please check for the latest firmware and information.
https://www.instagram.com/layfictone_official/ https://open.spotify.com/show/36InS0wrf8625omMYbOWxf https://twitter.com/Layfictone_Offi https://podca
sts.apple.com/us/podcast/layfictone-sound-late-show/id1694920296 https://www.facebook.com/LayficTone_official-110271295449253 %s To exit, please click the back button again.
Nearby Device permission required Starting from Android S (12.0), the system requires apps to be granted nearby device access in order to scan for BLE devices.\nYou can grant them in app settings.
Location permission required Starting from Android M (6.0), the system requires apps to be granted location access in order to scan for BLE devices.\nYou can grant them in app settings. Show Tooltips Device Connection Guide Open the settings app, select Bluetooth",then\nchoose The Industrial-ist Broadband and\nproceed with pairing. The connection was successful Connection Guide Guide on how to connect the smartphone\nto The Industrial-ist Broadband Next Start Device Power First, please press and hold the power\nbutton on both the left and right sides\nof the main unit. When the power is on,\nyou will hear a voice prompt. Bluetooth settings Launch settings app Exit the guide Add device User Guide Contact Us My devices Disconnected EQ Modes ON OFFHear-Thru ALL Reset Hear-Thru Firmware Update The Industrial-ist Broadband No device connected The connected device will be displayed here. This is an equalizer preset. Please select your preferred sound quality and enjoy. Choosing CUSTOM allows you to manually adjust the sound quality balance. You can toggle the noise cancelling ON/OFF here. There is a new firmware update available: ver.1.00.09
